author: Dennis Newman
comment: Works well, but I will get one or two alar.s and then it will go silent.  I didn't realize that several servers went down till double checking.  If the paid version won't 'silent out I'll be happy to buy it

author: hohoking5150
comment: Does exactly what I needed and does it well. Reliable performance. Never misses an alert.

author: Matlhatsi SaintPatrick Rallele
comment: It's a great App have been using it for 3 months

author: Aaron xx7
comment: Works really good for the most part, except sometimes the app stops running randomly. (Not sure if my phone is killing it)

author: Tiaan Viljoen
comment: Works

author: Emmanuel Alen
comment: Needed an ap to warn me when receiving specific emails anytime... and this ap does it. Thx

author: Alan Mihajlov
comment: I honestly hate have to handle my smartphone unless I really need to. There are numerous apps that can read SMS text, but I could not find one that will readout Gmail/email text as well. But this one does. So I can keep the phone in my shirt pocket and never miss an email without ever touching the smartphone. A LOT of features and customization. Powerful, handy app!

author: Dan Ambrose
comment: App works great to alert me of important emails

author: Andreas Grip
comment: The good is that it works and do it's work very well. The bad is that it  killing the battery. But have a powerbank and you can have alarms to make sure you get important information

author: peter hawley
comment: The only app I could find that would override silent and notify me of important emails during certain times of day. Incredibly important for my work and does the job very very well. Would recommend this to anyone

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Peter. Overriding silent is a challenge because the silent profile differs between versions of Android and some manufacturers have their own silent profile. But we try to make this feature work on as many devices as possible. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

comment: As a technician, being able to flag (with a unique sound) notifications for new calls coming in has been extremely helpful since I can't look/check my phone all the time. Thanks!

author: Evan Sadowski
comment: Excellent App and support for App. I use it every day to notify me of important emails and SMS. (NO BETTER APP THAT I KNOW OF)

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Evan. Feel free to contact me again at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Sidd Gould
comment: Need to alert two more things than just SMS and emails why not have more alerts than just SMS and email??

author: Mansour Salem
comment: Really cool view and many settings but doesn't work for mail body or mail subject And I really wanted that app for this two options Please please fix this so I can give it a 5 star rate and buy the app

author: Ricardo Valencia
comment: Pretty good App. I think notification module need to be improved. Sometimes I receive and do not receive alerts.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Ricardo. On newer versions of Android (6+), notifications can sometimes  be delayed due to restrictions on background processing. But the notification should eventually come through unless the email has been marked as read on the server in the meantime. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Diallo Dixon
comment: Very reliable and does exactly what I need

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Diallo. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Jon Sæverud Haddal
comment: Gets the job done. Lots of customization options.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Jon. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Jack Bender
comment: Does what it says on the tin. Perfect.

author: Jim Green
comment: Works great to keep an eye on my imap folders, if I attempt to execute an action on the received message (mark read, archive, delete) it fails though. Would be good if rules could be set up to move mail to other folders (not just junk, archive, deleted).

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Jim. The commands only operate on the IMAP server not the local email app. Archive requires that an archive folder is set on the account page. I agree with the move comment. It is on the TODO list. UPDATE: Hi Jim. The email server is bouncing all mails from: Hostmonster, GMail and Yahoo. I cannot contact you. Have a diff address? Regards, Glen

author: Lucas Ruiz Diaz
comment: Literally impossible to use with so many ads

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Lucas. You can upgrade to the full app if you do not wish to use the free ad supported app. With regards to ads, we only use banner ads which are the lest obtrusive and least profitable option available. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Craig Ephraim
comment: Has anyone gotten this to work with VMWare Boxer?

author: Jon Morgan
comment: This is so useful. I tag certain emails (server notifications) that arrive using gmail, and this picks up on that happening and alerts me when gmail gets one of these emails. Even if I've got my gmail open, this makes sure I know straight away of these important emails.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Jon. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

title: Useful Tool

author: Victor Biro
comment: Worst notification app I have used.    Spontaneously,  Google Play pages open  full screen and obstruct the the ability to use the phone,  or even dismiss the ad. Clicking the back button keeps opening another Google Play page.    NOW IMAGINE HAVING TO DO THIS WHILE DRIVING!   I have never had such a poorly designed application.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Victor. That is completely untrue. The only way GooglePlay can open is if you click on a banner ad. Banner ads can be removed by upgrading to the full app. Regards, Glen

author: Dan B
comment: It's very efficient. As a volunteer firefighter.  We get emails from dispatch,  on top of our pages. This apps works every time to notify me of a call when I'm out of pager range. Will be buying the paid version shortly.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Dan. Is app version 4.12 (released tonight) working for you? I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com. Regards, Glen

title: Works as advertised

author: Alex Shirley
comment: After developer getting it working for 7.1 it works until you add and save an IMAP account. Then it crashes and loses the IMAP account. Really need to do some QA on this imho.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Alex, AS7 is a new OS on 0.3% of devices. Full validation is very high priority, but other commitments are preventing it. Received AS7 report today [Sunday]. The preliminary assessment is that the 3rd party encryption lib used since AS2 no longer functions on AS7. Updating ASAP. If anyone wants a beta copy please email support. Regards, Glen

title: Crashes

author: KOIS ATHANASIOS
comment: works great!!!

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Kois. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Johnny Alhwayek
comment: I'm using this to sync one email address while I have sync on my device off (to save battery). The custom sounds are pretty neat, and while the app looks old, it does a great job!

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Johnny. Thanks. Yes I agree the UI needs a refresh. I suppose it hasn't been a priority since the app is primarily a background service. But internally it has been completely refreshed to be compatible with all the newest Android 7 tools and libraries. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Regards, Glen

title: Awesome

author: Charlotte Stevenson
comment: I like to have individual notifications for specific senders and found this app. It's been great so far and works a treat.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Charlotte. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com. Please send me an email if it stops working :) Regards, Glen

title: Great for custom notifications

author: Carl Rethmeier
comment: Does its job well and very customizable. One of the best apps for Android. Has all the features you want from a notification app.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Carl. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever have questions about the customisations. Regards, Glen

title: Awesome App

author: Eric Bartlett
comment: Great app.  Glen responds well also.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Cheers Eric. Please let me know if you have any more questions. Regards, Glen

author: Strange Shadow
comment: Gave it a shot to see if I could customize sms messages, so I could know who was texting me by sound, and repeat messages to not miss them anymore, didn't work at all, didn't cause sms notifications to repeat and didn't allow sms sounds to be customized, should be a built in android function like ring tones.
title: Didn't work for me

author: Joysurya Saha
comment: Email notification with Gmail is not working real-time . I did wait till 10-15 min after the mail entered in my Gmail inbox. But notification sound did not trigger. The moment I launched enotify app..then the notification sound get triggered and I saw the email processed by enotify just then..
title: Didn't work for me on xiaomi redmi note 3

author: Dan Magee
comment: Does what I needed it to do!

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Dan.  I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Cheers, Glen

title: Works

author: Ian Smith
comment: The one reason I downloaded this app was to set repeating SMS notifications for specific contacts. I built and configured  the alert, tested it twice and the notification never repeated.  Update: I appreciate the swift reply from Varietas Software.  "repeating alerts are cancelled as soon you interact with eNotfiy in any way. During your test, please ensure that you close the app and do not touch the status bar or popup notification."  During my tests I set up the repeat notification at 1 minute intervals for a specific contact. I then texted myself from the other contact's phone and let the first notification sound, then waited 5 minutes and no reminder fired on either test. I did not have the eNotify app running and did not touch the phone.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Ian, I'm happy to try get this working for you at android_support@verietassoftware.com. But I can't offer technical support in the review comments. Regards, Glen

author: Charles Feerick
comment: Do you only want to be alerted to emails from specific people, domains, etc?  Do you want a certain tone telling you this?  Do you want repeat alerts like every 5 mins so that you don't miss these messages because you put your phone down and missed it?  And do you want to not have to look at your phone constantly?   All this and many more features are here with this app.  Plus, the guy that supports and/or created it, responds right away to you and assists in problem resolution immediately.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Charles. A clone might improve my productivity :) We are happy to help. Cheers, Glen

title: Clone Glen

author: Legal Translations
comment: I use it to let me know of business email arriving.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Jose. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

title: Great

author: Nick Jones
comment: Works great and individual notifications are awesome! If and when I have any issues their support team contacts me back immediately.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Nick. We are happy to help. Cheers, Glen

title: Best notify app

author: jeff summers
comment: No good for me.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Jeff. I released a new version tonight 4.12. It addresses some recent instability issues caused by moving the app onto the android 5 software kit. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you want to report a defect. Regards, Glen

author: Ed Edison
comment: Only using the email notification at the moment. So far it is great and reliable! Similar programs have failed. Developer answered my question quickly even for the free version! This is the way it should be and I am now considering buying the full version.
title: Excellent!

author: Global Well-Being
comment: I was looking for a way to get notified when specific emails arrived and this app does that very well. It's easy to set up, modify and use. Thanks 😀
title: It Works!
